klonos said:

...on a second note, the user gifad no longer exists on GitHub. For security reasons perhaps remove them from the list of maintainers (someone may claim that username and potentially do harm if they request to be added)? ...we could add their name in the "Credits" section, and link to https://www.drupal.org/u/gifad instead.

Looks like there are a few other modules that list gifad as a maintainer: https://github.com/search?q=org%3Abackdrop-contrib+gifad&type=code

Build software better, together
GitHub is where people build software. More than 56 million people use GitHub to discover, fork, and contribute to over 100 million projects.

I think that the most appropriate action here would be to try to contact the person via their d.org contact form: https://www.drupal.org/user/395706/contact
...once they have replied, or enough time passed w/o any reply, we should open PRs against these modules, which remove the person from the maintainers section in the README files, and add them to the credits section, with an updated link to https://www.drupal.org/u/gifad instead of the their GitHub profile.
...once enough time has passed, we can check these PRs, and if they haven't been merged by any co-maintainers, then the Bug Squad should merge them.

So nobody actually knows the person behind that username? ...From the early Backdrop days maybe? Then trying to contact via drupal.org seems the cleanest solution. :+1:
